description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=3/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=2/3. This game is an action game with the puzzle element. The player operates a ninja and defeats a zombie and avoid a trap and advance. The trial version is 6 stages. The product version is 25 stages.
